1.0.1.name: wordpress/facebook-foot-panel
1.0.1.description:
This plugin was developed by Janvier at Wp rooms based on Soh tanaka's facebook style footer adimn panel at http://www.wprooms.com/2010/01/05/facebook-like-foot-panel.html

http://forums.wprooms.com/topic/facebook-footer-panel

It adds a footer panel like the one on facebook for buddypress.

Known Issues

*jquery conflict if there are more than one plugin calling it. *Wide page CSS errors (to be fixed in next version)
